source.646992c0:
def insertionSort(array):

    for step in range(1, len(array)):
        key = array[step]
        j = step - 1
        
        while j >= 0 and key < array[j]:
            array[j + 1] = array[j]
            j = j - 1
        
        array[j + 1] = key


data = [10, 5, 30, 15, 50, 6, 25]
insertionSort(data)
print('Sorted Array in Ascending Order:')
print(data)
